item.title: 早间竞价美元多头进入中国市场
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 创始人称 Telegram 平台用户数量将在年内达到 10 亿
item.description: Telegram 消息应用程序是乌克兰和俄罗斯最受欢迎的社交媒体平台之一，其创始人在本周二发表的讲话中说，该应用程序的月活跃用户将有可能在一年内突破 10 亿。【原文：The Telegram messaging app, one of the most popular social media platforms in Ukraine and Russia, will likely cross 1 billion active monthly users within a year, its founder said in remarks published on Tuesday.】

item.title: 苹果公司首席执行官表示正在研究在印尼建立生产设施的可能性
item.description: 苹果公司首席执行官周三在会见印尼总统佐科-维多多（Joko Widodo）后表示，苹果公司将研究在印尼建立生产设施的可能性。【原文：Apple Inc will look into the possibility of building a manufacturing facility in Indonesia, its CEO said on Wednesday after meeting President Joko Widodo.】

item.title: 中国比亚迪为其越野车方成宝系列推出三款新车型
item.description: 比亚迪发布了其高端品牌 "方成宝 "的三款新车型，其中包括两款概念车。【原文：BYD has unveiled three new models, including two concept cars, under its premium brand Fangchengbao as the Chinese electric vehicle giant ramps up efforts to sell into higher-priced segments.】

item.title: 澳大利亚莱因哈特公司入股林纳斯稀土公司，股价大涨
item.description: 澳大利亚首富吉娜-莱因哈特（Gina Rinehart）周二晚些时候提交的一份交易所文件显示，她已成为中国以外最大的稀土生产商林纳斯稀土公司（Lynas Rare Earths）的主要股东。【原文：Australia's richest person, Gina Rinehart, become a substantial shareholder in Lynas Rare Earths, the largest producer of rare earths outside of China, an exchange filing showed late on Tuesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，摩根士丹利将在亚太地区裁减约 50 个投资银行职位
item.description: 知情人士透露，由于交易不景气，摩根士丹利将在亚太地区裁减约 50 个投资银行职位。【原文：Morgan Stanley is cutting around 50 investment banking jobs in the Asia-Pacific region due to a deals slump, sources with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔重新考虑降息，亚洲股市涨跌不一，收益率跳涨
item.description: 周三，亚洲股市涨跌不一，因为世界上最强大的央行行长改变了对美国今年降息的看法，推动国债收益率创下五个月来的新高，美元对其他货币的汇率也高居不下。【原文：Asian shares were mixed on Wednesday as the world's most powerful central banker had a change of heart on U.S. rate cuts this year, pushing Treasury yields to new five-month highs and the dollar towering against other currencies.】

item.title: 美联储言论粉碎降息押注后美元持稳，日元脆弱
item.description: 在包括美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔在内的美联储官员发表言论，暗示美国利率可能在更长时间内保持较高水平后，美元周三基本持稳，日元则继续在34年低点附近徘徊。【原文：The dollar was broadly steady on Wednesday, keeping the yen rooted near 34-year lows after comments from Federal Reserve officials, including Chair Jerome Powell, suggested U.S. interest rates are likely to stay higher for longer.】

item.title: 需求担忧超过中东供应担忧，油价下跌
item.description: 周三早盘，油价有所回落，原因是对中国经济增长势头疲软和美国短期内降息希望减弱所导致的全球需求的担忧超过了对中东紧张局势加剧所导致的供应担忧。【原文：Oil prices eased in early trade on Wednesday as worries about global demand due to weak economic momentum in China and fading hopes for U.S. interest rate cuts in the near term outweighed supply fears on heightened tensions in the Middle East.】

item.title: 独家报道文件显示，越南为陷入巨额欺诈的银行提供 240 亿美元的 "史无前例 "救援
item.description: 根据三份银行文件和一位知情人士向路透社提供的最新官方信息，越南对陷入全国最大金融欺诈案的西贡股份商业银行（SCB）实施了 "史无前例 "的救援。【原文：Vietnam has mounted an "unprecedented" rescue of Saigon Joint Stock Commercial Bank (SCB), a lender engulfed in the nation’s biggest financial fraud, according to three bank documents and new official information provided to Reuters by a person with access to the documents.】

item.title: 力拓高管表示，力拓的目标是将决议铜矿留在美国
item.description: 力拓集团（Rio Tinto）的一位高级管理人员周二表示，如果这个拖延已久且备受争议的项目获得监管部门批准，力拓的目标是将其决议矿的铜矿全部留在美国境内。【原文：Rio Tinto , aims to keep all of the copper from its Resolution mine inside the United States should the long-delayed and controversial project win regulatory approval, a senior executive said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 报告称，由于风险模型滞后，全球财产保险公司面临 "惊人 "损失
item.description: 凯捷咨询公司（Capgemini）周三发布的一份报告称，由于自然灾害增多，而风险模型未能跟上，2022 年全球财产险和意外险承保人出现了 "惊人 "的承保损失。【原文：Global property and casualty insurers showed "alarming" underwriting losses in 2022 as natural catastrophes increased and risk models failed to keep up, a report from consultants Capgemini said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 在中国展销会上，出口商对自己的商品 "像白菜一样便宜 "感到绝望
item.description: 吴华占的中国电视机厂过去曾规定最低订单量，以有效管理生产。现在形势如此严峻，它可以接受任何订单。【原文：Wu Huazhan's Chinese television factory used to impose minimum orders to manage production efficiently. Times are now so bleak, it will take any order.】

item.title: 日元疲软挤压家庭，日本企业经营情绪下滑
item.description: 路透社的一项月度民意调查显示，受生活成本压力和主要市场中国经济形势不稳的拖累，4月份日本大型制造商和服务业企业的商业信心环比下滑。【原文：Business confidence at big Japanese manufacturers and services sector firms slid in April from the prior month, dragged down by cost-of-living pressures and shaky economic conditions in major market China, a Reuters monthly poll showed.】

item.title: 两位美国议员对迪士尼、福克斯、华纳体育流媒体企业表示担忧
item.description: 美国立法者杰里-纳德勒（Jerry Nadler）和华金-卡斯特罗（Joaquin Castro）周二对华特-迪斯尼、福克斯和华纳兄弟发现公司计划成立的体育流媒体合资企业提出了竞争问题。【原文：U.S. lawmakers Jerry Nadler and Joaquin Castro on Tuesday raised competition concerns over the sports streaming joint venture planned by Walt Disney , Fox and Warner Bros Discovery .】

item.title: 墨西哥 America Movil 第一季度净利润同比下降超过 50
item.description: 墨西哥电信巨头 America Movil 周二公布，由于比索走强稀释了海外收益，其第一季度净利润下降 55.2%，降至 135 亿比索。【原文：Mexican telecommunications giant America Movil on Tuesday posted a 55.2% decrease in its first-quarter net profit, landing at 13.5 billion pesos, as a stronger peso diluted earnings from abroad.】

item.title: 美国工会支持诺福克与安科拉的代理权争夺战
item.description: 美国一个顶级工会联合会敦促诺福克南方公司的股东投票反对 Ancora 的董事候选人，认为对冲基金对该铁路的计划将影响安全和正在考虑的改进措施。【原文：A top federation of U.S. labor unions has urged Norfolk Southern shareholders to vote against Ancora's director candidates, arguing the hedge fund's plans for the railroad would compromise safety and improvements being considered.】

item.title: 早间竞价：鲍威尔泯灭宽松希望，市场再度受挫
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 墨西哥 Banorte 公司第一季度利润增长 9%，贷款额增加
item.description: 墨西哥金融集团 Banorte 周二报告称，第一季度净利润同比增长 9%，原因是其贷款额有所增长。【原文：Mexico's Grupo Financiero Banorte reported on Tuesday a 9% increase in first-quarter net profit from the year-ago period, citing growth in its loan book.】

item.title: 侠盗猎车手》发行商 Take-Two Interactive 将裁员 5
item.description: 侠盗猎车手》（Grand Theft Auto）系列游戏的发行商 Take-Two Interactive Software 周二表示，该公司将裁员约 5%，因为游戏业将过去两年的裁员计划延续到了 2024 年。【原文：Take-Two Interactive Software will lay off about 5% of its workforce, the publisher of the "Grand Theft Auto" franchise said on Tuesday, as the gaming industry extends its job cuts from the past two years into 2024.】

item.title: 美联航季度盈利预期增强；下调飞机交付预期
item.description: 美国联合航空公司（United Airlines Holdings）周二预计，由于旅游需求强劲，本季度盈利将强于预期，而第一季度的亏损将小于预期。【原文：United Airlines Holdings on Tuesday forecast stronger-than-expected earnings in the current quarter, after reporting a narrower-than-expected loss in the first quarter, on robust demand for travel.】

item.title: 蒙特利尔银行首席执行官称美国经济正在改善，并称加州为 "具有战略意义的重要市场
item.description: 蒙特利尔银行（Bank of Montreal）负责人表示，美国经济正显示出比预期更强劲的增长迹象，而加利福尼亚州是一个具有战略意义的重要市场，该银行已在其南部邻国迅速扩张。【原文：The U.S. economy was showing signs of stronger than expected growth, with California being a strategically important market, said the head of Bank of Montreal , which has rapidly expanded in its southern neighbour.】

item.title: Smartmatic 与 One America News 就选举诽谤诉讼达成和解
item.description: Smartmatic 已就指控右翼电视网络 One America News 谎称该投票技术公司操纵 2020 年美国总统大选以帮助乔-拜登击败唐纳德-特朗普的诽谤诉讼达成和解。【原文：Smartmatic has settled a lawsuit accusing right-wing television network One America News of defamation by falsely claiming that the voting technology company rigged the 2020 U.S. presidential election to help Joe Biden beat Donald Trump.】

item.title: 受税收外流和国债供应影响，美国融资利率小幅上升
item.description: 本周美国短期融资成本略有上升，原因是与税收有关的资金外流以及为财政部发债融资的现金需求，但市场参与者表示，没有迹象表明存在更广泛的流动性问题。【原文：U.S. short-term funding costs rose slightly this week due to tax-related outflows and demand for cash to finance the Treasury's debt issuance, but market participants said there was no indication of broader liquidity issues.】

item.title: 耶伦称释放俄罗斯资产价值对援助乌克兰很重要
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）周二表示，美国及其七国集团（G7）盟国正在继续探索一系列可能性，以释放被冻结的近3000亿美元俄罗斯资产的价值，从而援助乌克兰。【原文：The U.S. and its Group of Seven (G7) allies are continuing to explore a range of possibilities to unlock the value of nearly $300 billion in frozen Russian assets to aid Ukraine, U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 拜登政府与各州合作保护航空公司客户
item.description: 美国交通部长皮特-巴蒂吉格（Pete Buttigieg）周二宣布与各州检察长合作，快速调查针对航空公司和机票代理商的投诉，这是拜登政府加强消费者保护工作的一部分。【原文：U.S. Transportation Secretary Pete Buttigieg on Tuesday announced a partnership with state attorneys general to fast-track investigations into complaints against airlines and ticket agents as part of the Biden administration's efforts to enhance consumer protections.】

item.title: 花旗为首的大型银行在削减成本的压力下继续裁员
item.description: 美国银行业巨头在第一季度继续裁员，其中花旗集团的裁员幅度最大。【原文：U.S. banking giants continued to shed employees in the first quarter, with Citigroup seeing the biggest drop.】

item.title: 穆迪称，2023 年美国企业违约中，惯犯占 40
item.description: 根据信用评级机构穆迪（Moody's）的最新报告，在 2023 年拖欠债务的美国公司中，约有 40% 以前曾拖欠过债务。【原文：Around 40% of U.S. companies that defaulted on their debt obligations in 2023 had previously done so, according to a new report from credit ratings agency Moody's.】

item.title: 阿迪达斯第一季度业绩强劲，上调盈利指引
item.description: 体育用品公司阿迪达斯在第一季度业绩好于预期后，周二上调了 2024 年的盈利指导。【原文：Sporting goods company Adidas on Tuesday raised its 2024 earnings guidance after a better than expected performance during the first quarter.】

item.title: 华尔街老板欢呼投资银行业收益，但仍保持谨慎
item.description: 华尔街的老板们终于看到了投资银行业务广泛回暖的迹象，但他们还没有大声欢呼。【原文：Wall Street's bosses are finally seeing signs of a broader pickup in investment banking, but they are not cheering too loudly just yet.】
